name: Cursed Breed
description:
Cursed Breed is a action filled hack-n-slash. Wielding the very power that has sealed away this creature for centuries, you must fight this ancient evil to seal it away once again.Be ready as this struggle will leave you bloodied, broken, and possibly dead, Will you be victorious and defeat The Queen of this Cursed Breed or will your corpse add to the pile?

Check out the team behind this awesome game at http://bit.ly/2FIqpw5!
